forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Desktop Mode quality upbump

comments.text: Hi everyone! In Update 160.5 (you're on [version]), we've increased the Desktop Mode rendering quality:
The number of closest lights is +2 (for 5 overall). The number of closest shade-throwing of lights is +1 (for 2 overall).
To enter Desktop Mode, just hit ESC or one of WASD (otherwise, the desktop rendering will be reusing the VR render).
(Note if you customize your quality in Me -> More -> Nearby Limits, these will also be automatically added when in desktop mode.)
Feedback as always welcome! Hope you enjoy!

thread.latestCommentText: Feedback as always welcome! Hope you enjoy!
